On.Terms: AnimGroupApply; AnimPlayingProps Ready; IsStatus ReadyIsApplied 0; ValidateUnit NotMounted
AnimGroupRemove; !AnimPlayingProps Ready; IsStatus ReadyIsApplied 0; ValidateUnit NotMounted

Remove.Send: AnimBracketStart BSD Birth Stand Death ContentPlayOnce

On.Terms: AnimDone; AnimName Spell; AnimIs Spell Spell,C,Start
